'''Yuan Qing''' is quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the [[World Quest]] ''[[The Tree who Stands Alone]].''

He is the son of the late [[Yuan Hong]] and the brother of the late [[Yuan Cheng]] and [[Yuan Liang]].

===Appearance===
Yuan Qing is a tall man of slim build with short black hair. At the time of his death, he was wearing loose beige pants, a brown tee and a light brown vest on top. He was also wearing dark brown shoes. He appears as a ghost.
